outputs.output_descr: This project will achieve: (1) a functional regional mechanism for SDS-SEA implantation; (2) national policies and reforms for sustainable costal and ocean governance; (3) Scaling up integrated coastal management programs; (4) twinning arrangements for river basin and coastal area management; (5) intellectual capital and human resources;   (6) public and private sector investment and financing in environmental infrastructure project and services.

project_descr: Implementation of the Sustainable Development Strategy for the Seas of East Asia
project_title: Sustainable Development Strategy for Seas of East Asia
